pickOne: **Good** - Use magic to directly aid another.
**Neutral** - Discover something about a magical mystery.
**Evil** - Use magic to cause terror and fear.

title: Race
pickOne: Elf - Magic is as natural as breath to you. Detect Magic is a cantrip for you.
Human - Choose one cleric spell. You can cast it as if it was a wizard spell.

outcomes.text: This move does nothing and is a placeholder for future development.
